info.title: Sytemap API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Sytemap application with OTP verification and user management

get.summary: Get list of all agents and their referrals
get.description: This endpoint returns all agents with their referred users. Only accessible by admin.

200.description: List of agents and their referrals

post.description: Register a new user and send OTP for email verification

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your email for verification code.

post.summary: Verify user email address via OTP
post.description:
Verifies a user's email address using a One-Time Password (OTP) sent to their email. 
     *     If verification is successful, the user's email_verified_at timestamp is updated.

email.description: The registered email address of the user.

otp.description: The 6-digit OTP sent to the user's email.

otp: The otp field must be 6 characters.

post.description:
Resends a One-Time Password (OTP) to the provided email address for email verification. 
     *     If the email is already verified, the request will fail.

email.description: The registered email address of the user.

email: The selected email is invalid or does not exist.

post.description: Login user with email and password
Login as an agent and return referral code if successful.
Create a new estate with basic information and images
Upload photos, 3D model images, videos, and virtual tour URLs for an estate

get.description: Retrieve top 10 highest rated estates with media and plot details
Alternative approach using joins for better performance with large datasets

post.description: Create detailed plot information for an estate

get.summary: Get all plot details with filtering
get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all plot details with optional filtering

post.summary: Get nearby estates based on user coordinates
post.description: Retrieve a list of estates within a specified radius of the user's latitude and longitude

distance_km.description: Distance from user location in kilometers

post.summary: Search and filter estates based on specified criteria
post.description: Retrieve a paginated list of estates filtered by minimum price, maximum price, state, town or city, and amenities

state.description: State where the estate is located

town_or_city.description: Town or city where the estate is located

message.example: Failed to filter and search estates

get.summary: Get full details of a specific estate
get.description: Retrieve complete details of an estate by its ID, including associated media and plot details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the estate to retrieve

error.example: No estate found with the provided ID

get.description: Retrieve all estates with media and plot details

post.description:
Generate plots for a given estate based on its available plots. 
     *                  Each plot will be assigned a unique plot_id, coordinates, and availability status.

parameters.name: estateId
parameters.description: The ID of the estate to generate plots for

message.example: Generated 50 plots for estate: Beryl Estate Lagos

get.summary: Get all plots for an estate
get.description: Retrieve all plots belonging to a specific estate by estate ID

post.description: Generate a preview of the pricing and details for selected plots in an estate before buying

plots.description: Array of plot IDs the customer wants to buy

post.description: Confirms customer selection of plots, calculates pricing, determines payment type (installment or full), generates a payment schedule (if installment), initializes a Paystack transaction, reserves plots (mark as sold), and returns payment details including link and reference.

plots.description: Array of plot IDs to purchase

payment_type.description: Type of payment selected by the buyer. If 'installment', 'installment_months' is required.

installment_months.description: Number of months for installment payments (112). Required only if payment_type is 'installment'.

200.description: Purchase confirmed and Paystack payment link generated

message.example: Purchase initialized successfully. Proceed to payment.

400.description: Some selected plots are unavailable or payment initialization failed

get.description: Returns summary metrics for the authenticated customer, including the number of purchased properties, held (active installment) properties, and total outstanding payment amount.

purchased_properties.description: Number of fully paid and owned properties.

held_properties.description: Number of properties currently on installment or reserved but not fully paid.

total_outstanding_payment.description: Total remaining balance across installment purchases.

get.description: Returns a list of all properties purchased by the authenticated customer, grouped by payment status (full paid, outstanding, held). Each property includes related estate, plot, and media details.

200.description: Successful response with properties grouped by status

total_purchased.description: Total number of fully paid properties

held.description: List of held or reserved properties

401.description: Unauthorized  when no valid authentication token is provided

post.summary: Allocate property to a customer (Admin Only)
post.description:
Allows admin to manually allocate plots to a customer. This can be used for special allocations, 
     *                  gifts, promotional offers, or administrative corrections. The plots will be marked as sold 
     *                  and a CustomerProperty record will be created.

user_id.description: The ID of the customer to allocate property to

plots.description: Array of plot IDs to allocate

total_price.description: Total price for the allocation (optional, will be calculated if not provided)

installment_months.description: Number of installment months (0 or null for full payment)

404.description: User, estate, or plots not found

get.description: Retrieve a list of all properties with filtering options

tags.name: Estate Management
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing estates, media, and plot details
